config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration 'gi.igi.samples' is used in the code to set the number of photons for InstantGI. It retrieves the value from the 'Options' object passed to the constructor.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the 'gi.igi.samples' configuration depends on when an instance of InstantGI is created with the corresponding 'Options' object. It will be triggered whenever InstantGI is instantiated with new options.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The 'gi.igi.samples' configuration impacts the quality of global illumination in the system. Setting a higher value for 'gi.igi.samples' will result in more accurate and smoother global illumination, but may also increase the computational load and render time.
